name: Yosemite National Park
description: Yosemite National Park is in California’s Sierra Nevada mountains. It’s famed for its giant, ancient sequoia trees, and for Tunnel View, the iconic vista of towering Bridalveil Fall and the granite cliffs of El Capitan and Half Dome.

name: Little Black Creek Park
description: Beautiful little spot. Nothing here but parking! The creek is teeming with beautiful wildlife. I strongly recommend catch and release.Love the wildlife and it will love you back!

name: Irondequoit Bay State Marine Park
description: Irondequoit Bay State Marine Park is a 44-acre state park and boat launch located in Monroe County, New York, north of the City of Rochester. The park is operated by the Town of Irondqeuoit and primarily facilitates fishing and boating access to Irondequoit Bay and Lake Ontario.

name: Webster Park Campgrounds
description: Small family campground with sites for tents, pop-ups, trailers, 5th wheels and RVs. Located within Webster Park. Open seasonally from May 1st to October 31st each year.
